account_new acc1 10000000

transaction_build contract_with_revert
    sender acc1
    receiverAddress 00
    value 0
    data 
    gas 1200000
    build

block_build b01
    parent g00
    transactions contract_with_revert
    build

block_connect b01

# Assert best block
assert_best b01

assert_balance acc1 9857039

transaction_build tx02
    sender acc1
    nonce 1
    contract contract_with_revert
    data 8457fd0a
    value 5000 # even
    gas 1000000
    build

block_build b02
    parent b01
    transactions tx02
    build

block_connect b02

# Assert best block
assert_best b02

# spend 99527 gas running the contract
assert_balance acc1 9756792

transaction_build tx03
    sender acc1
    nonce 2
    contract contract_with_revert
    data 8457fd0a
    value 5001 # odd number reverts as soon as it enters
    gas 1000000
    build

block_build b03
    parent b02
    transactions tx03
    build

block_connect b03

# Assert best block
assert_best b03

# spend only 21424 because the contract uses the revert OPCODE
assert_balance acc1 9735368
